-- Generated by CSharp.lua Compiler
local System = System
local ET = ET
local ET
System.import(function (out)
  ET = out.ET
end)
System.namespace("ET", function (namespace)
  namespace.class("UIHelper", function (namespace)
    local Create, Remove
    Create = function (scene, uiType)
      return System.async(function (async, scene, uiType)
        return async:Await(ET.UIComponentSystem.Create(scene:GetComponent(ET.UIComponent), uiType))
      end, nil, scene, uiType)
    end
    Remove = function (scene, uiType)
      return System.async(function (async, scene, uiType)
        ET.UIComponentSystem.Remove(scene:GetComponent(ET.UIComponent), uiType)
        async:Await(ET.ETTask.getCompletedTask())
      end, nil, scene, uiType)
    end
    return {
      Create = Create,
      Remove = Remove
    }
  end)
end)
